Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2008 04:13PM alenej wrote: I may be starting chemo as early as tomorrow.  The reason I say may is because I'm still weighing the pros and cons.  I had a mastectomy with all of the lymph nodes on that side removed about 4 weeks ago now.  My oncologist gave me some general estimate results for further treatment.  The mastectomy gave a figure of 73 out of 100 women are alive in 10 years.  Chemo would add only a 7 to that.  Hormonal therapy would add 7 as well.  Combining the two adds 12.  I just don't know if that 7% is really worth it all.
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in April haykat57 angie27
